record.key: Sleepers^ MessageBox "In your dream, a tall figure with a golden mask greeted you, saying: 'There are many rooms in the house of the Master. Be easy, for from the hands of your enemies I have delivered you.' It seemed you had died and could see yourself laid upon a table lit by candles. But with your own hands you touched the figure, and the figure drew breath, opened eyes, and rose from the table. Then the room was gone, and the world filled with light, and you awoke." "Ok"
record.val: Sleepers^ MessageBox "In your dream, a tall figure with a golden mask greeted you, saying: 'There are many rooms in the house of the Master. Be easy, for from the hands of your enemies I have delivered you.' It seemed you had died and could see yourself laid upon a table lit by candles. But with your own hands you touched the figure, and the figure drew breath, opened eyes, and rose from the table. Then the room was gone, and the world filled with light, and you awoke." "Ok"

record.key: Sleepers^ MessageBox "In your dreams, a tall figure in a golden mask spoke to you: Lord Nerevar Indoril, Hai Resdaynia! Long forgotten, forged anew! Three belied you, three betrayed you! One you betrayed was three times true! Lord Voryn Dagoth, Dagoth Ur! Steadfast liegeman, faithful friend, bids you come and climb Red Mountain! Beneath Red Mountain, once again, break your bonds, shed cursed skin, and purge the n'wah from Morrowind!" "Ok"
record.val: Sleepers^ MessageBox "In your dreams, a tall figure in a golden mask spoke to you: Lord Nerevar Indoril, Hai Resdaynia! Long forgotten, forged anew! Three belied you, three betrayed you! One you betrayed was three times true! Lord Voryn Dagoth, Dagoth Ur! Steadfast liegeman, faithful friend, bids you come and climb Red Mountain! Beneath Red Mountain, once again, break your bonds, shed cursed skin, and purge the n'wah from Morrowind!" "Ok"

record.key: Sleepers^ MessageBox "You dreamed that a tall figure with a golden mask spoke to you, but you understood not a word. He smiled, and seemed pleasant, but when he reached to touch you, it terrified you, and you tried to escape, but you couldn't move. You tried to cry out, but you couldn't make a sound. The figure kept smiling and talking, but you felt sure he was trying to cast some sort of spell on you. When you woke, you couldn't recall how the dream ended." "Ok"
record.val: Sleepers^ MessageBox "You dreamed that a tall figure with a golden mask spoke to you, but you understood not a word. He smiled, and seemed pleasant, but when he reached to touch you, it terrified you, and you tried to escape, but you couldn't move. You tried to cry out, but you couldn't make a sound. The figure kept smiling and talking, but you felt sure he was trying to cast some sort of spell on you. When you woke, you couldn't recall how the dream ended." "Ok"

record.key: Sleepers^ MessageBox "You had a disturbing dream. You can only recall one part. A tall figure with a golden mask led you among the dead as through a wedding celebration. You heard many voices, but no lips moved. You strained to breathe, but your chest didn't move. The tall figure spoke with each figure as he passed among them, laughing and joking, as if they were alive, but they made no reply. You tried to cry out, but without breath, your tongue fluttered in vain." "Ok"
record.val: Sleepers^ MessageBox "You had a disturbing dream. You can only recall one part. A tall figure with a golden mask led you among the dead as through a wedding celebration. You heard many voices, but no lips moved. You strained to breathe, but your chest didn't move. The tall figure spoke with each figure as he passed among them, laughing and joking, as if they were alive, but they made no reply. You tried to cry out, but without breath, your tongue fluttered in vain." "Ok"

record.key: Sotha_Alma^ Say "vo\misc\tr_almaend_1.mp3" , "Nerevarine. Here it ends. This Clockwork City was to be your death. You were to be my greatest martyr! The heroic Nerevarine, sacrificing all to protect Morrowind from the mad Sotha Sil. But you live! You live!"
record.val: Sotha_Alma^ Say "vo\misc\tr_almaend_1.mp3" , "Nerevarine. Here it ends. This Clockwork City was to be your death. You were to be my greatest martyr! The heroic Nerevarine, sacrificing all to protect Morrowind from the mad Sotha Sil. But you live! You live!"

record.key: Sotha_Alma^ Say "vo\misc\tr_almaend_4a.mp3" , "But I smell the blood of gods on your hands, Nerevarine. Vivec was a fool. I'm sorry I wasn't there to see his death. But Sotha Sil...he always thought himself our better, shunning us, locking himself in his hole. He spoke not a word as he died. Not a whisper. Even in death, he mocked me with his silence! But I think you will scream, mortal. For now, you face the one true god."
record.val: Sotha_Alma^ Say "vo\misc\tr_almaend_4a.mp3" , "But I smell the blood of gods on your hands, Nerevarine. Vivec was a fool. I'm sorry I wasn't there to see his death. But Sotha Sil...he always thought himself our better, shunning us, locking himself in his hole. He spoke not a word as he died. Not a whisper. Even in death, he mocked me with his silence! But I think you will scream, mortal. For now, you face the one true god."

record.key: Sotha_Alma^ Say "vo\misc\tr_almaend_4b.mp3" , "None may stand in my way. Not you, and certainly not Vivec. He is a poet, a fool. I will deal with him when I have finished with you. And Sotha Sil...he always thought himself our better, shunning us, locking himself in his hole. He spoke not a word as he died. Not a whisper. Even in death, he mocked me with his silence! But I think you will scream, mortal. For now, you face the one true god."
record.val: Sotha_Alma^ Say "vo\misc\tr_almaend_4b.mp3" , "None may stand in my way. Not you, and certainly not Vivec. He is a poet, a fool. I will deal with him when I have finished with you. And Sotha Sil...he always thought himself our better, shunning us, locking himself in his hole. He spoke not a word as he died. Not a whisper. Even in death, he mocked me with his silence! But I think you will scream, mortal. For now, you face the one true god."

record.key: Sotha_Alma^ Say "vo\misc\tr_almaend_2.mp3" , "Fear not. I will tell the tale myself when this is done. I will tell my people how with your dying breath you proclaimed your devotion to me, the one true god. Your death will end this prophecy and unite my people again under one god, one faith, one rule by my divine law. The puppet king will lay down his arms and bow to my will. Those who do not yield will be destroyed."
record.val: Sotha_Alma^ Say "vo\misc\tr_almaend_2.mp3" , "Fear not. I will tell the tale myself when this is done. I will tell my people how with your dying breath you proclaimed your devotion to me, the one true god. Your death will end this prophecy and unite my people again under one god, one faith, one rule by my divine law. The puppet king will lay down his arms and bow to my will. Those who do not yield will be destroyed."

record.key: Sotha_Alma^ Say "vo\misc\tr_almaend_3.mp3" , "The Mazed Band has allowed me to travel to this place. Here, I slew Sotha Sil. Here, I summoned the Fabricants to attack Mournhold. I will be the savior of my people! I alone will be their salvation!"
record.val: Sotha_Alma^ Say "vo\misc\tr_almaend_3.mp3" , "The Mazed Band has allowed me to travel to this place. Here, I slew Sotha Sil. Here, I summoned the Fabricants to attack Mournhold. I will be the savior of my people! I alone will be their salvation!"

record.key: TribEnd^ Say "Vo\Misc\tr_azuraend3a.mp3", "There is much for you still to do. Vivec lives, and he may yet have a part to play in your future. Continue on your chosen path. The skies of Mournhold are clear once again. Let these people suffer no longer. Now go, mortal. Embrace your destiny, and go with my blessing."
record.val: TribEnd^ Say "Vo\Misc\tr_azuraend3a.mp3", "There is much for you still to do. Vivec lives, and he may yet have a part to play in your future. Continue on your chosen path. The skies of Mournhold are clear once again. Let these people suffer no longer. Now go, mortal. Embrace your destiny, and go with my blessing."

record.key: TribEnd^ Say "Vo\Misc\tr_azuraend3b.mp3", "There is much for you still to do. Vivec, is dead, though I thought he might play a part in your future. Continue on your chosen path. The skies of Mournhold are clear once again. Let these people suffer no longer. Now go, mortal.Embrace your destiny, and go with my blessing."

The skies of Mournhold are clear once again. Let these people suffer no longer. Now go, mortal.Embrace your destiny, and go with my blessing."

record.key: TribEnd^ Say "Vo\Misc\tr_azuraend3c.mp3", "Your work in Morrowind is not finished, Nerevarine. Vivec still lives, but I believe his time grows short. Protect my people. Defend these lands. The skies of Mournhold are clear once again. Let these people suffer no longer. Now go, mortal. Embrace your destiny, and go with my blessing."
record.val: TribEnd^ Say "Vo\Misc\tr_azuraend3c.mp3", "Your work in Morrowind is not finished, Nerevarine. Vivec still lives, but I believe his time grows short. Protect my people. Defend these lands. The skies of Mournhold are clear once again. Let these people suffer no longer. Now go, mortal. Embrace your destiny, and go with my blessing."

record.key: TribEnd^ Say "Vo\Misc\tr_azuraend3d.mp3", "Your work in Morrowind is not finished, Nerevarine. The Tribunal are dead, and the faith of my people is shaken. Protect them. Defend these lands. The skies of Mournhold are clear once again. Let these people suffer no longer. Now go, mortal. Embrace your destiny, and go with my blessing."
record.val: TribEnd^ Say "Vo\Misc\tr_azuraend3d.mp3", "Your work in Morrowind is not finished, Nerevarine. The Tribunal are dead, and the faith of my people is shaken. Protect them. Defend these lands. The skies of Mournhold are clear once again. Let these people suffer no longer. Now go, mortal. Embrace your destiny, and go with my blessing."

record.key: TribEnd^ Say "Vo\Misc\tr_azuraend1.mp3", "You have done well, mortal. The death of Almalexia is a boon for all of Morrowind, though it may take time for this to be understood. She would have betrayed the Dunmer as surely as she betrayed all those who she loved. This was her curse, and her undoing. "
record.val: TribEnd^ Say "Vo\Misc\tr_azuraend1.mp3", "You have done well, mortal. The death of Almalexia is a boon for all of Morrowind, though it may take time for this to be understood. She would have betrayed the Dunmer as surely as she betrayed all those who she loved. This was her curse, and her undoing. "

record.key: TribEnd^ Say "Vo\Misc\tr_azuraend2.mp3", "Weep not for Sotha Sil. He shed his mortality long ago, and I am certain his death was no small relief to him. These gods lived with the burden of a power no mortal was meant to possess."
record.val: TribEnd^ Say "Vo\Misc\tr_azuraend2.mp3", "Weep not for Sotha Sil. He shed his mortality long ago, and I am certain his death was no small relief to him. These gods lived with the burden of a power no mortal was meant to possess."

record.key: VampireMolag^ Player->Say "Vo\Misc\MS_VampireMolag1.wav", "So, you do not enjoy the blood hunger, little leech? Do you miss the warmth of the sun? I can obtain the cure for you, but you will help me first. You will find my daughter, Molag Grunda, in the dungeon Dubdilla below Mt. Assarnibibi. There she hides with her consort, the lowly atronach Nomeg Gwai. She believes hiding in a sorcerer's cave will shield her from my eyes. Foolish girl!"
record.val: VampireMolag^ Player->Say "Vo\Misc\MS_VampireMolag1.wav", "So, you do not enjoy the blood hunger, little leech? Do you miss the warmth of the sun? I can obtain the cure for you, but you will help me first. You will find my daughter, Molag Grunda, in the dungeon Dubdilla below Mt. Assarnibibi. There she hides with her consort, the lowly atronach Nomeg Gwai. She believes hiding in a sorcerer's cave will shield her from my eyes. Foolish girl!"

record.key: VampireMolag^ Player->Say "Vo\Misc\MS_VampireMolag2.wav", "I ordered her not to associate with these animals. I told her what the penalty would be for her disobedience! Yet she continues to defy me! Willful beast! I cannot have this. Find her, mortal. Kill her and the atronach, so I may deal with them in the Outer Realms. When this is done, return to me, and I will rid you of your unlife. Take care, mortal, for she is powerful. She is still a daughter of Molag Bal."
record.val: VampireMolag^ Player->Say "Vo\Misc\MS_VampireMolag2.wav", "I ordered her not to associate with these animals. I told her what the penalty would be for her disobedience! Yet she continues to defy me! Willful beast! I cannot have this. Find her, mortal. Kill her and the atronach, so I may deal with them in the Outer Realms. When this is done, return to me, and I will rid you of your unlife. Take care, mortal, for she is powerful. She is still a daughter of Molag Bal."

record.key: VampireMolag^ Player->Say "Vo\Misc\MS_VampireMolag3.wav","I see you have done as I asked, little vampire. It was not easy for me to obtain the cure, but I was able to pry it from Vaernima after some...discussion. You have earned it. Now I have eternity to punish my daughter for her defiance. Your curse is lifted. Yet...I wonder, will you miss the taste of blood on your lips? When you sleep, will you taste the salt and copper flowing over your tongue? Go, mortal. Bask in your precious sunlight."
record.val: VampireMolag^ Player->Say "Vo\Misc\MS_VampireMolag3.wav","I see you have done as I asked, little vampire. It was not easy for me to obtain the cure, but I was able to pry it from Vaernima after some...discussion. You have earned it. Now I have eternity to punish my daughter for her defiance. Your curse is lifted. Yet...I wonder, will you miss the taste of blood on your lips? When you sleep, will you taste the salt and copper flowing over your tongue? Go, mortal. Bask in your precious sunlight."

record.key: VampireMolag^ MessageBox "Once like a Great House founded on sand, Stood our Temple whose pillars on troubles were based. Now mischievous spirits, bound, in dim corners stand, Rotted columns, but with iron-bound bands embraced. Cracked, crumbling marble, tempered on every hand, By strong steel forged in fire and faith. Shackled, these wayward servants serve the land, The Temple secured by the Builder's grace."
record.val: VampireMolag^ MessageBox "Once like a Great House founded on sand, Stood our Temple whose pillars on troubles were based. Now mischievous spirits, bound, in dim corners stand, Rotted columns, but with iron-bound bands embraced. Cracked, crumbling marble, tempered on every hand, By strong steel forged in fire and faith. Shackled, these wayward servants serve the land, The Temple secured by the Builder's grace."

record.key: hircine1Script^ Say "Vo\Misc\bm_wildhunt2.wav" "You and the others are to find your way to my Hunting Grounds. Take great care, as only one of you will earn the glory of facing the Hunter himself in battle while the Bloodmoon lights the sky. The others have gone ahead, so only you remain to begin. Beware, mortal--my Hounds are about, and they hunger for blood. Perhaps I will see you soon. Now go."
record.val: hircine1Script^ Say "Vo\Misc\bm_wildhunt2.wav" "You and the others are to find your way to my Hunting Grounds. Take great care, as only one of you will earn the glory of facing the Hunter himself in battle while the Bloodmoon lights the sky. The others have gone ahead, so only you remain to begin. Beware, mortal--my Hounds are about, and they hunger for blood. Perhaps I will see you soon. Now go."

record.key: hircine1Script^ Say "Vo\Misc\bm_wildhunt1.wav" "Ahhh...you have arrived. The others have been here for days now, and you are the last. It is time for my Hunt, and you are to take part. I have chosen only the most worthy to take part in the Hunt -- Carius of the Imperials, Heart-Fang of the Skaal, the frost giant Karstaag....and you. You have proven yourself a worthy hunter, and so you have been given this honor."
record.val: hircine1Script^ Say "Vo\Misc\bm_wildhunt1.wav" "Ahhh...you have arrived. The others have been here for days now, and you are the last. It is time for my Hunt, and you are to take part. I have chosen only the most worthy to take part in the Hunt -- Carius of the Imperials, Heart-Fang of the Skaal, the frost giant Karstaag....and you. You have proven yourself a worthy hunter, and so you have been given this honor."

record.key: hircine2Script^ MessageBox "What is the hunter's greatest strength?" "Strength" "Speed" "Guile"
record.val: hircine2Script^ MessageBox "What is the hunter's greatest strength?" "Strength" "Speed" "Guile"

record.key: hircine2Script^ Say "Vo\Misc\bm_wildhunt4.wav" "I ask you, though: what is it that makes a hunter great? Is it his strength? The speed with which he strikes? Or is it his guile, the ability to outwit his prey? Answer me, mortal, and decide your fate."
record.val: hircine2Script^ Say "Vo\Misc\bm_wildhunt4.wav" "I ask you, though: what is it that makes a hunter great? Is it his strength? The speed with which he strikes? Or is it his guile, the ability to outwit his prey? Answer me, mortal, and decide your fate."

record.key: hircine2Script^ Say "Vo\Misc\bm_wildhunt5.wav" "So you have chosen, and so shall be your fate. To face me in all my glory would be less than sporting, so you shall face but one of my aspects, the one you have chosen. We have little time--the Bloodmoon sinks low in the sky. Prepare yourself, mortal, for now you are the Hunted."
record.val: hircine2Script^ Say "Vo\Misc\bm_wildhunt5.wav" "So you have chosen, and so shall be your fate. To face me in all my glory would be less than sporting, so you shall face but one of my aspects, the one you have chosen. We have little time--the Bloodmoon sinks low in the sky. Prepare yourself, mortal, for now you are the Hunted."

record.key: hircine2Script^ Say "Vo\Misc\bm_wildhunt3.wav" "So...you are the one. You have escaped my hounds and beaten back the other challengers. I had rather expected the giant to prevail, but no matter. You have proven yourself a worthy hunter, and you have earned the greatest honor that can be bestowed upon a mortal: you are to be my prey."
record.val: hircine2Script^ Say "Vo\Misc\bm_wildhunt3.wav" "So...you are the one. You have escaped my hounds and beaten back the other challengers. I had rather expected the giant to prevail, but no matter. You have proven yourself a worthy hunter, and you have earned the greatest honor that can be bestowed upon a mortal: you are to be my prey."

record.key: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers1.mp3" , "Good evening to you, serjo."
record.val: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers1.mp3" , "Good evening to you, serjo."

record.key: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers2.mp3" , "No, serjo, it's only me here. My master, Sedura Kena Telvanni Hordalf Xyr, is at his winter estate. Is there something I can do for you?"
record.val: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers2.mp3" , "No, serjo, it's only me here. My master, Sedura Kena Telvanni Hordalf Xyr, is at his winter estate. Is there something I can do for you?"

record.key: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers3.mp3" , "Not at all, serjo. Please. May I offer you some flin?"
record.val: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers3.mp3" , "Not at all, serjo. Please. May I offer you some flin?"
playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers4.mp3" , "Anara, serjo."

record.key: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers5.mp3" , "More than a fortnight ago. That's why it's only me in the castle, serjo. All the other servants and slaves who tend to his lordship travel with him. Is there something wrong?"
record.val: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers5.mp3" , "More than a fortnight ago. That's why it's only me in the castle, serjo. All the other servants and slaves who tend to his lordship travel with him. Is there something wrong?"

record.key: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers6.mp3" , "No, serjo. I know no one by that name."
record.val: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers6.mp3" , "No, serjo. I know no one by that name."

record.key: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers7.mp3" , "B'vek, that's strange. I suppose it's possible that my master knew this man, but being an Ashlander and my master being of the House of Telvanni, well, if you'll pardon me for being flippant, serjo, I don't think they would be friends."
record.val: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers7.mp3" , "B'vek, that's strange. I suppose it's possible that my master knew this man, but being an Ashlander and my master being of the House of Telvanni, well, if you'll pardon me for being flippant, serjo, I don't think they would be friends."

record.key: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers8.mp3" , "Please, serjo, go wherever you want. We have nothing to hide. We're loyal Imperial subjects."
record.val: playScript^ "gureryne selvilo"->Say "vo\misc\ms_performers8.mp3" , "Please, serjo, go wherever you want. We have nothing to hide. We're loyal Imperial subjects."

record.key: shrineDagonFel^ MessageBox "Once like a Great House founded on sand, Stood our Temple whose pillars on troubles were based. Now mischievous spirits, bound, in dim corners stand, Rotted columns, but with iron-bound bands embraced. Cracked, crumbling marble, tempered on every hand, By strong steel forged in fire and faith. Shackled, these wayward servants serve the land, The Temple secured by the Builder's grace."
record.val: shrineDagonFel^ MessageBox "Once like a Great House founded on sand, Stood our Temple whose pillars on troubles were based. Now mischievous spirits, bound, in dim corners stand, Rotted columns, but with iron-bound bands embraced. Cracked, crumbling marble, tempered on every hand, By strong steel forged in fire and faith. Shackled, these wayward servants serve the land, The Temple secured by the Builder's grace."

record.key: shrineStopMoon^ MessageBox "Here Vivec stopped the moon before it crashed into Vivec City. The moon levitates now above the city and is known as the Ministry of Truth."

record.key: shrineStopMoon^ MessageBox "The Grace of Daring: Thank you for your daring, Lord Vivec. I shall not shun risk, nor hide behind the mask of cautious counsel, for fortune favors the bold."
